words.translation: Has|(there) come|upon|man|a period|of|time|not|he was|a thing|mentioned

translations.1: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkooraa
translations.2: Hal ata AAala alinsani heenun mina alddahri lam yakun shayan mathkooran

words.translation: Indeed We|[We] created|man|from|a sperm-drop|mixture|(that) We test him;|so We made (for) him|hearing|and sight

translations.1: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta-leehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa
translations.2: Inna khalaqna alinsana min nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahu sameeAAan baseeran

words.translation: Indeed We|guided him|(to) the way|whether|(he) be grateful|and whether|(he) be ungrateful

translations.1: Innaa hadainaahus sabeela immaa shaakiranw Wa-immaa kafoora
translations.2: Inna hadaynahu alssabeela imma shakiran waimma kafooran

words.translation: Indeed We|[We] have prepared|for the disbelievers|chains|and shackles|and a Blazing Fire

translations.1: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa-fireena salaasila Wa-aghlaalanw Wa-sa'eeraa
translations.2: Inna aAAtadna lilkafireena salasila waaghlalan wasaAAeeran

words.translation: Indeed|the righteous|will drink|from|a cup|is|its mixture|(of) Kafur

translations.1: Innal abraara yashra-boona min kaasin kaana mizaa-juhaa kaafooraa
translations.2: Inna alabrara yashraboona min kasin kana mizajuha kafooran

words.translation: A spring|will drink|from it|(the) slaves|(of) Allah|causing it to gush forth|abundantly

translations.1: Aynany yashrabu bihaa 'ibaadul laahi yufajjiroonahaa tafjeeraa
translations.2: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibadu Allahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeeran

words.translation: They fulfill|the vows|and fear|a Day|(which) is|its evil|widespread

translations.1: Yoofoona binnazri Wa-yakhaafoona yawman kaana sharruhoo mustateeraa
translations.2: Yoofoona bialnnathri wayakhafoona yawman kana sharruhu mustateeran

words.translation: And they feed|the food|in spite of|love (for) it|(to the) needy|and (the) orphan|and (the) captive

translations.1: Wa-yut'imoonat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihee miskeenanw Wa-yateemanw Wa-aseeraa
translations.2: WayutAAimona alttaAAama AAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseeran

words.translation: Only|we feed you|for (the) Countenance|(of) Allah|Not|we desire|from you|any reward|and not|thanks

translations.1: Innaamaa nut'imukum li-wajhil laahi laa nureedu minkum jazaaa'anw Wa-laa shukooraa
translations.2: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahi la nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukooran

words.translation: Indeed we|fear|from|our Lord|a Day|harsh|and distressful

translations.1: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'aboosan qamtareeraa
translations.2: Inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman AAaboosan qamtareeran

words.translation: But will protect them|Allah|(from the) evil|(of) that|Day|and will cause them to meet|radiance|and happiness

translations.1: Fa-waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi Wa-laqqaahum nadratanw Wa-surooraa
translations.2: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalika alyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasurooran

words.translation: And will reward them|because|they were patient|(with) a Garden|and silk

translations.1: Wa-jazaahum bimaa sabaroo janatanw Wa-hareeraa
translations.2: Wajazahum bima sabaroo jannatan wahareeran

words.translation: Reclining|therein|on|couches|Not|they will see|therein|any sun|and not|freezing cold

translations.1: Muttaki'eena feeha 'alal araaa-'iki laa yarawna feehaa shamsanw Wa-laa zamhareeraa
translations.2: Muttakieena feeha AAala alaraiki la yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareeran

words.translation: And near|above them|(are) its shades|and will hang low|its cluster of fruits|very low

translations.1: Wa-daaniyatan 'alaihim zilaaluhaa Wa-zullilat qutoofu-haa tazleela
translations.2: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluha wathullilat qutoofuha tathleelan

words.translation: And will be circulated|among them|vessels|of|silver|and cups|that are|(of) crystal

translations.1: Wa-yutaafu 'alaihim bi-aaniyatim min fiddatinw Wa-akwaabin kaanat qawaareeraa
translations.2: Wayu<u>ta</u>fu AAalayhim bi<u>a</u>niyatin min fi<u>dd</u>atin waakw<u>a</u>bin k<u>a</u>nat qaw<u>a</u>reer<u>a</u>

words.translation: Crystal-clear|of|silver|They will determine its|measure

translations.1: Qawaareera min fiddatin qaddaroohaa taqdeeraa
translations.2: Qawareera min fiddatin qaddarooha taqdeeran

words.translation: And they will be given to drink|therein|a cup|is|its mixture|(of) Zanjabil

translations.1: Wa-yuskawna feehaa kaasan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabeelaa
translations.2: Wayusqawna feeha kasan kana mizajuha zanjabeelan

words.translation: A spring|therein|named|Salsabil

translations.1: Aynan feeha tusammaa salsabeelaa
translations.2: AAaynan feeha tusamma salsabeelan

words.translation: And will circulate|among them|young boys|made eternal|When|you see them|you would think them|(as) pearls|scattered

translations.1: Wa-yatoofu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladoona izaa ra-aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu-'am mansoora
translations.2: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanun mukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum luluan manthooran

words.translation: And when|you look|then|you will see|blessings|and a kingdom|great

translations.1: Wa-izaa ra-ayta samma ra-ayta na'eemanw Wa-mulkan kabeera
translations.2: Waitha raayta thamma raayta naAAeeman wamulkan kabeeran

words.translation: Upon them|(will be) garments|(of) fine silk|green|and heavy brocade|And they will be adorned|(with) bracelets|of|silver|and will give them to drink|their Lord|a drink|pure

translations.1: Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw Wa-istabraq, Wa-hullooo asaawira min fiddatinw Wa-saqaahum Rabbuhum sharaaban tahooraa
translations.2: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusin khudrun waistabraqun wahulloo asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahooran

words.translation: Indeed|this|is|for you|a reward|and has been|your effort|appreciated

translations.1: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazz-'anw Wa-kaana sa'yukum mashkooraa
translations.2: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaan wakana saAAyukum mashkooran

words.translation: Indeed We|[We]|[We] revealed|to you|the Quran|progressively

translations.1: Innaa nahnu nazzalnaa 'alaikal quraana tanzeelaa
translations.2: Inna nahnu nazzalna AAalayka alqurana tanzeelan

words.translation: So be patient|for (the) Command|(of) your Lord|and (do) not|obey|from them|any sinner|or|disbeliever

translations.1: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika Wa-laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafooraa
translations.2: Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafooran

words.translation: And remember|(the) name|(of) your Lord|morning|and evening

translations.1: Wazkuris ma Rabbika bukratanw Wa-aseelaa
translations.2: Waothkuri isma rabbika bukratan waaseelan

words.translation: And of|the night|prostrate|to Him|and glorify Him|a night|long

translations.1: Wa-minal laili fasjud lahoo Wa-sabbihhu lailan taweelaa
translations.2: Wamina allayli faosjud lahu wasabbihhu laylan taweelan

words.translation: Indeed|these|love|the immediate|and leave|behind them|a Day|grave

translations.1: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibboona 'aajilata Wa-yazaroona waraaa'ahum yawman saqeelaa
translations.2: Inna haolai yuhibboona alAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawman thaqeelan

words.translation: We|created them|and We strengthened|their forms|and when|We will|We can change|their likeness[es]|(with) a change

translations.1: Nahnu khalaqnaahum Wa-shadadnaaa asrahum Wa-izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala-hum tabdeelaa
translations.2: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadna asrahum waitha shina baddalna amthalahum tabdeelan

words.translation: Indeed|this|(is) a reminder|so whoever|wills|let him take|to|his Lord|a way

translations.1: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa-man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihee sabeela
translations.2: Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan

words.translation: And not|you will|except|that|wills|Allah|Indeed|Allah|is|All-Knower|All-Wise

translations.1: Wa-maa tashaaa'oona illaa any yashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana 'Aleeman Hakeema
translations.2: Wama tashaoona illa an yashaa Allahu inna Allaha kana AAaleeman hakeeman

words.translation: He admits|whom|He wills|to|His mercy|but (for) the wrongdoers|He has prepared|for them|a punishment|painful

translations.1: Yudkhilu mai yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; wazzaalimeena a'adda lahum 'azaaban aleemaa
translations.2: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihi waalththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathaban aleeman
